name: Bon's Origins
description:
"There was surprisingly a lot to do today... I'm exhausted."

This short game is the beginning of everything. It tells a story of a lonely man whose evening would turn into a catasrophy if it wasn't for one thing. The events that occurred would not only change his mood, but the life he has been living up until now. Play the game to find out more about his fate.

In the process of making this game, there were a few people who helped me and it means a lot to me. Check me out on my social media and my SoundCloud where all of the game OST is!

Game made with RPG Maker MV

Average beat time : 7-10 minutes
